items.title: Just $16 today gets you this Anker adapter that turns one wall outlet into six and adds additional USB ports
items.summary:
Anker 10-in-1 outlet extender with USB ports

Buy for $16 (Reg. $20)

What we love

This Anker wall outlet extender adds six AC sockets – all of which are neatly arranged at the top – along with two USB-C and two USB-A ports with a maximum output of up to 20W. It’s particularly useful for spots where you may need to power multiple devices, and it’s also great for tight spaces, sitting flush against the wall to keep desks and counters clear. Its compact size also makes it easy to pack for travel.

items.title: ESA astronomers say they used AI model AnomalyMatch to scan 100M image cutouts from the Hubble Legacy Archive in 2.5 days, finding ~1,400 "anomalous objects" (Robert Hart/The Verge)
items.summary:
Robert Hart / The Verge:
ESA astronomers say they used AI model AnomalyMatch to scan 100M image cutouts from the Hubble Legacy Archive in 2.5 days, finding ~1,400 “anomalous objects”  —  The AI model took just 2.5 days to search 100 million image cutouts and flag oddities like jellyfish galaxies.

This particular AIO cooler typically goes for $100 and has been fetching its full price at Newegg and directly at the brand’s online store. Amazon, however, has lately been offering it for $60, which today’s 60% markdown beats by $20 to mark a new all-time low. It’s a pretty good option to consider if you’re looking to build a new PC or upgrade to a 360mm cooler for your existing CPU, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.
